description: No time to cook? Try these easy and fast chicken burgers. With sweet pineapple and beetroot, theyâ€™re packed with flavour.
keywords: Chicken burger,Quick & easy dinner,Seafood free,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: 10Minute Tropical Chicken Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large frying pan over mediumhigh heat and add the olive oil.
Add the burger patties to pan and cook for 2 minutes each side, or until golden brown and cooked through. Remove and drain on paper towel.
Meanwhile, toast the bread rolls, if desired, cutside up, under a preheated grill until golden, about 1-2 minutes.
Top bases with patties, beetroot and pineapple. Top with bun tops and serve.
